entry.title: Powder Diffraction Auto Reduction
entry.content:
• POWGEN autoreduction now will write out the XML configuration file that can be loaded into the POWGEN reduction GUI in Mantid Workbench.

  • The autoreduction scripts for NOMAD (all_nom) and POWGEN (all_pg3) now takes an optional argument to specify the output directory.

  • The POWGEN autoreduction configuration backup files are not all organized into a dedicated subfolder under <IPTS>/shared/autoreduce/auto_params_backup, where <IPTS> refers to the path to the IPTS, e.g., /SNS/PG3/IPTS-32378.
entry.summary: POWGEN autoreduction now will write out the XML configuration file that can be loaded into the POWGEN reduction GUI in Mantid Workbench.

entry.title: Updates on Powder Diffraction Data Tools

link.title: Updates on Powder Diffraction Data Tools

entry.content:
We have several updates on the data processing and analysis for powder diffraction.

  • A batch way of data merging as one of the post-processing steps for running MantidTotalScattering reduction is added into the mts_data tool. See the documentation here (specifically, refer to the -g flag).

  • Run RMCProfile in GSAS-II. See details here.
entry.summary: We have several updates on the data processing and analysis for powder diffraction.

entry.title: Updates on Absorption Pre-Calculation
entry.content:
We just added in the beamn height definition in the absorption pre-calculation routine (abs_pre_calc) for SNS powder diffractometers at ORNL. Meanwhile, the routine now incorporate the autoreduction configuration routine so that all necessary operations to be done regarding the autoreduction can be done with a single routine,

  • Sample information collection

  • Absorption pre-calculation

  • Autoreduction configuration

entry.title: Useful Total Scattering Data Processing Utilities

link.title: Useful Total Scattering Data Processing Utilities

entry.content:
We are announcing several useful implementations regarding the neutron powder total scattering data reduction and processing.

Main Features

  • User definition of sample and container geometry for absorption correction enabled in the Mantid framework
  • A chunk-by-chunk Fourier filter routine pystog_ck made available to general users on Analysis cluster. Detailed instructions can be found here.
  • A hydrogen background removal routine is available on Analysis through mts_data. Detailed instructions can be found here.
entry.summary: We are announcing several useful implementations regarding the neutron powder total scattering data reduction and processing.

entry.title: A Web-based Quick Data Plotter
entry.content:
Excited to announce the release of a data plotter in ADDIE, addie.ornl.gov/plotter.

Main Features

  • A data plotter accessible from anywhere on the web
  • Handling several tens of data files
  • Support up to 10 different folders selection of files
  • Quick comparison between two data sets
  • Robust handling of headers
  • Minimal user inputs
entry.summary: Excited to announce the release of a data plotter in ADDIE, addie.ornl.gov/plotter.
